comment.author: 9537324@N02
comment._content: Translation: A woman with twins and a Christmas tree in a stroller. Amsterdam, December 11, 1964

comment.author: 74383284@N08
comment._content: Sieger van Denneheuvel januari 2012 : The two little ones in the picture are Sieger and Philip van Denneheuvel and the mum overlooking the stroller (kinderwagen) is Marijke van Denneheuvel ( in 1964 Marijke Tonneman). We are very pleased to have this picture now in high resolution. We do have the picture as a newspaper clipping but never got to the original. The pictured stroller is of tank type strength and was used as an all purpose vehicle as can be seen
